comment._content: There are hardly 2 uniforms alike, with many different collars. Some seem to have rings of rank on their sleeves. How many of these are teachers? Mind that lamp when you are swinging around! maps.osi.ie/publicviewer/#V1,660561,610625,7,9

comment.author: 41919490@N07
comment._content:
So many hopes, dreams, expectations, trials and tribulations to come to this small group, who assembled for their faces to be viewed over 100 years ago.
14 lives now spent.  At what cost?

It awakens the seed of ones own mortality.

comment.author: 14302637@N08
comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/time_traveller] The camera is like a time machine. The girls are looking through the lens into the darkness of the future.
